tool_description: Get the list of Countries, States / Regions and Cities data globally using TurnUp's REST-ful API.
name: TurnUp Locations
title: TurnUp Locations

api_list.name: getCountriesByName
api_list.description: GET Country or Countries Information by the respective Country Name. Return data includes States withing each Country/Countries returned.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com/countries/kenya"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{country_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getCountryByID
api_list.description: GET simple Country information by the related country internal ID.

api_list.name: getCountries
api_list.description: GET a simple list of all Countries and their internal Country ID's. Suited for Drop-down Lists mapping Countries, States and Cities Selections.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getStates
api_list.description: GET list of States / Regions Data globally.

api_list.name: getCitiesByName
api_list.description: GET a City or Cities Information by providing the requested the City Name.

api_list.name: getContinents
api_list.description: GET list of Continents with their related Continent Codes.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getContinentByCode
api_list.description: GET list of Continent data by specifying the requested Continent Code.

url = "https://turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com/continents/AF"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

import requests

url = "https://turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com/continents/{continent_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turnup-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getStatesByCountryID
api_list.description: GET a list of State / Region within a Country by passing the internal Country ID. Suited for Drop-down Lists mapping Countries, States and Cities Selections.

api_list.name: getCitiesByCountryID
api_list.description: GET list of Cities / Towns within a Country by passing the internal Country ID.

api_list.name: getStatesByName
api_list.description: GET State or States information including individual Cities / Towns within the State by passing the requested State Name or the Region Name.

api_list.name: getCitiesByStateID
api_list.description: GET simple list of Cities/Towns per State by passing the internal State ID. Suited for Drop-down Lists mapping Countries, States and Cities Selections.
